plot: Zane and Zoey serve as the last line of defense between the real world and the nightmare creatures of the Dreamworlds. Controlled by the evil Icela, the nightmares have come to life and are threatening to break through to the real world.
plot_en: Zane and Zoey serve as the last line of defense between the real world and the nightmare creatures of the Dreamworlds. Controlled by the evil Icela, the nightmares have come to life and are threatening to break through to the real world.
plot_es: Zane and Zoey serve as the last line of defense between the real world and the nightmare creatures of the Dreamworlds. Controlled by the evil Icela, the nightmares have come to life and are threatening to break through to the real world.
title: Dream Defenders
